description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Create music quickly on your Xbox 360. Best viewed as a fun music/sketch toy, Mr BeatLoop lets you create loops using 3 different drum kits and 8 different instruments. Edit the loops in real time, change the speed, save and load your best ideas! Designed with absolute ease of use and fun in mind - Mr BeatLoop is great for sketching up quick musical ideas, or just experimenting!
